A lot of people were not sure when JV suggested this alternative calendar. Looks like he totally called it right, especially with the charm, skill and entertainment Lachlan brings. He's also a pretty decent bike rider :-)

Morton is a superb embassador for cycling in general and I love what EF are doing in trying to connect grass roots cycling, with us mere mortals, to the elite echelons of the sport. Lachlan Morton, with Alex Howes and team EF are doing a great job here and I hope some of the other pro peloton teams take up the idea.
Smiling during bike throw. Classic!
Freaking loved this video, keep this stuff up EF, Rapha, and especially Lachlan!!
Wow! I did the walk and that was tough so this is just different gravy!
That was awesome Lach!  Well done!
Peaks ? Where ?
Lachlan, WOW!!!
His enthusiasm on the bike is a joy. What a guy.
These mini documentaries are a breath of fresh air and I really hope you continue with this in 2020.
I was hoping I would see myself and family in that film as we were walking up wernside the day of the race. Great viewing anyway.
I absolutely love this, proper inspiring riding and people. I just hope the pro tour world don't latch on and turn it into something it was never meant to be.
Most inspiring pro in the field!
RIP John Rawnsley
I am definitely not sick of hearing Lachlan talk about this, hope it continues.
I am glad Jeremy Corbyn ditched politics for cycling. I am sure he's a lot nicer fellow now. Cheers Jezza
EF this rocks !!! Love it ! More please !
I am so NOT sick of hearing you talk
Hell yeah!
"... and if you don't, there will be a little bit of bother."  Classic understatement. Love it!
The alternative calender took me from absolutely hating the fucking world - to just riding my bike for mad fun like a kid. Lochlan is an absolute legend.
I love these videos and could listen to Lachlan talk all day! Thank you
That was a really great episode. Lachlan's chilled-out enthusiasm is infectious! I'm off out for a ride on my hardtail mtb now. Up UCSC trails and down to the ocean!
I'm totally stoked on all of these Lachlan vids! Keep em coming!!

I've done quite a few breaks in Yorkshire and the people are great üôè that countryside is brilliant also, went to that viaduct in the middle of a crazy rainstorm and it's total full out up there.. serious terrain!
These are an awesome set of videos. Try a 24 hour solo next year - like the Strathpuffer :)
This series got me out of my car.   Ride on !

Let me add my voice. This series is awesome. Best thing for bike racing since the derailleur. EF has gotten more mileage out of this than all the tour victories combined. Brilliant. And Lachlan, you are perfect for this. We are absolutely not tired of hearing you talk. Keep it up, you are the best ambassador for cycling ever.
Now that Taylor is retired, there is no doubt that Lachlan is my by far my favorite pro rider. Cheers mate.
i wish Lachlan could stay young forever and race forever
Not sick of hearing you talk about cycling yet Lachlan!  I love your passion for the bike and for the cycling community.
I love this whole alternative calendar thing you guys are doing. So cool seeing these guys competing in events which I could (if I was mental) sign up for in 2020 and give a try.
So, so good
missing Taylor Phinney :())))
stop explaining, let the pictures speak.
Great video

Ah Lachy's the best! üòÅ
Well done EF on creating this alternative calendar. Been fantastic watching Lachlan and his personality shine with this program. Well done

Wrong Lachlan, we love hearing you talk. This schedule is amazing and makes it so real for you to ride the same courses as us mere mortals. It makes cycling cool when someone like me can talk about DK experiences with someone like you. Love it. JV is once again breaking new ground for professional cycling.

EF have found something with this alternative calendar. I had the good fortune to meet and chat with the crew at Dirty Kanza this year and what a cool down to earth group. Cyclists connect with this. Well done lads.
never stop giving back to cycling - awesome
These programs are way , way better than watching world tour races.
Which bike doesn‚Äôt matter. Lachlan a ride any where rider what a champion. Thank you EF for allowing this to happen to get much closer to the cycling community

I love how this series starts out and you get good exposure to Morton, Phinney, and Howes. Right off the bat, Morton was the only one worth watching IMO. He just had the right attitude about this alternative calendar and it was an absolute joy to follow. Cheers Lachlan!!!
Absolutely loving these videos!!!
I love this series. I'm waiting for Lachlan to do No Country For Old Men (NCOM) in southwest Texas next year.
#fivestepsahead
Nick Craig, legend.
nice
Welcome to Eposhire!
Stunning. Had been waiting for this one since the alternative calendar was announced!
Lachlan is so awesome.
Kanza, Leadville, and Three Peaks in one year - how lucky to get to do three bucket list events in one season.
These series are off their chops! Keep up the amazing videos Rapha.
These races and films are amazing. Thanks for keeping  each one fresh
A-maze-ingChapeau to to the whole film production team.

These are all so inspiring.  Tour Divide 2020!
Are we going to see you in the sufferfest hillclimb in Taiwan? Great stuff! Thanks EF & Cannondale!
Please, please continue the alternative calendar next season!

i just watch these videos you've done with the biggest smile on my face. it doesn't matter that i can't do these epic rides.  when i do the lame-a$$, flat centuries that i do, i think i still have the same elation and joy.  and certainly it encourages me to do more.  when lachlan talks about giving back, he's not making it up. he really is.  thanks to him and all those responsible for these vids.
The best video to date, chapeau EF, Rapha and Lachlan for the alternative 2019 race calendar, truly inspiring.
Brilliant! Well done EF and Rapha, this has been a thoroughly entertaining series to follow all season. üëèüèª
Lachlan!!  ---  Can you get Gus to join you on one of these rides PLEASE !??   Luv reading all these comments on what EF, Rapha and Lachlan are doing here. Absolutely awe inspiring

Hiw can anyone not love Lachlan.  He's such a gnarly, goofy dude!Another killer vid, EF.  This series is phenomenal.
These videos always put a smile on my face.
EF racing...new favorite cycling team.Rapha Films...new favorite film channel
I am instantly a fan now! Rapha keep these coming!

This guy is epic!!!!  EF cycling please keep this alternate thing going damn.  This will inspire people to ride bikes way more than any tour does.  These are accessible bike events that everyone can do.  EF please keep this going I love it!!! and love Lachlan Morton!! That is cyclocross LOL wow.
Lachlan needs to be retained as an "INFLUENCER"/Community rep, no matter what.  Love this shit.
Oh wow, another great bike race? video- no just a great bicycle celebration video. I dig this stuff and Lachlan is a fun dude to follow. Cheers, Steve aka The Talking Fly.
I want to ride 24 hours with Lachlan Morton and then drink like ten beers with him. That dude is hilarious.
This is great
No click baits. Trials and tribulations what make this channel awesome.

Lachlan is proving to be a great off road racer and if he keeps on ne day he will be up there with Nick. Great video.

epic

boys keep the content coming soooo good

Thanks to EF, Rapha and the other riders...and I can now say I rode a race with a world tour pro...cheers.
